page.title: 01Oversight - Yardley
page.content: The block is primarily residential, the houses having been built in the last sixty years.However a large part lies within the old manor of Yardley, which includes Yardley Old Village.The area is not particularly socially deprived although the flats in the area show some signs of the problems of city life. A substantial part is given over to urban recreational open space. There is a fairly large industrial estate in the block which shows the diversity of British industry and,untypically,seems to be thriving.
